text: بَلْ مَتَّعْتُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ وَرَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ

translation.en.sahih: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger.
translation.id.indonesian: Tetapi Aku telah memberikan kenikmatan hidup kepada mereka dan bapak-bapak mereka sehingga datanglah kepada mereka kebenaran (Al Quran) dan seorang rasul yang memberi penjelasan.
